refnamediv.refpurpose: A widget used to implement first and last pages in a druid's sequence.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: A druid can be thought of as having a page that starts the sequence, one or more pages that end the sequences (there can be multiple end pages if the flow of pages diverges at some point) and some pages that are in between the start and end pages.
The GnomeDruidPageEdge widget is for the first and last pages in a druid's sequence of pages. Pages in the "middle" of a sequence should use GnomeDruidPageStandard.

refsect2.title: enum GnomeEdgePosition

warning.para: GnomeEdgePosition is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Used to pass around information about the position of a GnomeDruidPage within the overall GnomeDruid. This enables the correct "surrounding" content for the page to be drawn.

listitem.simpara: The current page is at the beginning of the druid.
The current page is at the end of the druid.
The current page is neither the first nor the last page (usually not required).
Used internally to indicate the last value of the enumeration. This should not be passed in to any function expecting a GnomeEdgePosition value.

refsect2.title: GnomeDruidPageEdge

warning.para: GnomeDruidPageEdge is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: A widget holding information about the overall look of the currently displaying druid page.

listitem.simpara: The current title of the displayed page.
The current text of the displayed page.
The logo of the displayed page.
The watermark on the left side of the displayed page.
The watermark on the top of the displayed page.
The color of the edge of the current page (outside the text area).
The color of the textbox area of the displayed page.
The background color of the displayed page's logo.
The color of the title text.
The color of the body text.
The position of the current page within the druid (a GnomeEdgePosition value).

warning.para: gnome_druid_page_edge_new is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

listitem.simpara: Position in druid.
GtkWidget pointer to a new GnomeDruidPageEdge.

refsect2.title: gnome_druid_page_edge_new_aa ()

warning.para: gnome_druid_page_edge_new_aa is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Creates a new GnomeDruidPageEdge widget. The internal canvas is created in an antialiased mode.

listitem.simpara: Position in druid.
GtkWidget pointer to a new GnomeDruidPageEdge.

refsect2.title: gnome_druid_page_edge_new_with_vals ()
refsect2.programlisting: GtkWidget * gnome_druid_page_edge_new_with_vals (GnomeEdgePosition position, gboolean antialiased, const gchar *title, const gchar *text, GdkPixbuf *logo, GdkPixbuf *watermark, GdkPixbuf *top_watermark);

warning.para: gnome_druid_page_edge_new_with_vals is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: This will create a new GNOME Druid Edge page, with the values given. It is acceptable for any of them to be NULL. Position should be GNOME_EDGE_START, GNOME_EDGE_FINISH or GNOME_EDGE_OTHER.

listitem.simpara: Position in druid.
Use an antialiased canvas
The title.
The introduction text.
The logo in the upper right corner.
The watermark on the left.
The watermark on the left.
GtkWidget pointer to a new GnomeDruidPageEdge.

refsect2.title: gnome_druid_page_edge_construct ()
refsect2.programlisting: void gnome_druid_page_edge_construct (GnomeDruidPageEdge *druid_page_edge, GnomeEdgePosition position, gboolean antialiased, const gchar *title, const gchar *text, GdkPixbuf *logo, GdkPixbuf *watermark, GdkPixbuf *top_watermark);

warning.para: gnome_druid_page_edge_construct is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Useful for subclassing and language bindings, this function fills the given pieces of information into the existing druid_page_edge.

listitem.simpara: A GnomeDruidPageEdge instance.
The position of druid_page_edge within the druid.
Unused in the current implementation. Set to FALSE.
The title of the page.
The text in the body of the page.
The logo on the page.
The watermark on the side of the page.
The watermark on the top of the page.

refsect2.title: gnome_druid_page_edge_set_bg_color ()

warning.para: gnome_druid_page_edge_set_bg_color is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: This will set the background color to be the color. You do not need to allocate the color, as the druid_page_edge will do it for you.

listitem.simpara: A GnomeDruidPageEdge instance.
The new background color.

refsect2.title: gnome_druid_page_edge_set_textbox_color ()

warning.para: gnome_druid_page_edge_set_textbox_color is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Sets the color of the background in the main text area of the page.

listitem.simpara: A GnomeDruidPageEdge instance.
The new textbox color.

refsect2.title: gnome_druid_page_edge_set_logo_bg_color ()

warning.para: gnome_druid_page_edge_set_logo_bg_color is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Set the color behind the druid page's logo.

listitem.simpara: A GnomeDruidPageEdge instance.
The new color of the logo's background.

refsect2.title: gnome_druid_page_edge_set_title_color ()

warning.para: gnome_druid_page_edge_set_title_color is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Sets the color of the title text on the current page.

listitem.simpara: A GnomeDruidPageEdge instance.
The color of the title text.

refsect2.title: gnome_druid_page_edge_set_text_color ()

warning.para: gnome_druid_page_edge_set_text_color is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Sets the color of the text in the body of the druid page.

listitem.simpara: A GnomeDruidPageEdge instance.
The new test color.

refsect2.title: gnome_druid_page_edge_set_text ()

warning.para: gnome_druid_page_edge_set_text is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Sets the contents of the text portion of the druid page.

listitem.simpara: A GnomeDruidPageEdge instance.
The text contents.

refsect2.title: gnome_druid_page_edge_set_title ()

warning.para: gnome_druid_page_edge_set_title is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Sets the contents of the page's title text.

listitem.simpara: A GnomeDruidPageEdge instance.
The title text

refsect2.title: gnome_druid_page_edge_set_logo ()

warning.para: gnome_druid_page_edge_set_logo is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Sets a GdkPixbuf as the logo in the top right corner. If NULL, then no logo will be displayed.

listitem.simpara: A GnomeDruidPageEdge instance.
The GdkPixbuf to use as a logo.

refsect2.title: gnome_druid_page_edge_set_watermark ()

warning.para: gnome_druid_page_edge_set_watermark is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Sets a GdkPixbuf as the watermark on the left strip on the druid. If watermark is NULL, it is reset to the normal color.

listitem.simpara: A GnomeDruidPageEdge instance.
The GdkPixbuf to use as a watermark.

refsect2.title: gnome_druid_page_edge_set_top_watermark ()

warning.para: gnome_druid_page_edge_set_top_watermark is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Sets a GdkPixbuf as the watermark on top of the top strip on the druid. If top_watermark_image is NULL, it is reset to the normal color.

listitem.simpara: the GnomeDruidPageEdge to work on
The GdkPixbuf to use as a top watermark
